content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **sizes ** 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 **finished chest fullest point circumference ** 79 5 87 5 95 5 111 119 5 127 143 151 159 cm / 31¼ 34½ 37½ 43¾ 47 50 56¼ 59½ 62½ - to be worn with -1 5 to +9 5cm / -¼ to +3¾ ease model s height is 155 5cm / 5 2 with a chest fullest point circumference of 114 3 cm / 45 and is wearing a size 5 **materials ** hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 160 m 175 yds yarn a 094 wisteria 1 skein yarn b 077 light petrol blue 1 skein yarn c 055 sunny yellow 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins yarn d 062 light pink 1 skein yarn e 071 light sky blue 1 skein yarn f 049 peach 1 skein yarn g 046 old rose 1 skein yarn h 084 green 1 skein yarn i 018 lime 1 skein **needles ** 3 5mm / us 4 circular needle 60-90cm / 24-36 length plus 1 spare circular of equal or smaller needle size and similar circumference and needles suitable for working small circumferences in the round 3 75mm / us 4 double pointed needles always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **pattern information ** suncatcher is knitted flat from the bottom up in 2 pieces with sleeves knit in the round after seaming short row end at the shoulder bone and shape the drop shoulder into standing off the arm slightly for a better range of movement note cotton yarn can stretch vertically from the weight of the garment to simulate this stretching during blocking for accuracy hang the swatch with something lightweight attached to the swatch such as clothespins 1 intarsia square to measure approximately 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 5 9 cm / 1¾ 2 2¼ 2½ 2½ 2¾ 3 3¼ 3½ square before blocking **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4
